DOC.HEADLINE: Barrichello, Hulkenberg to drive for Williams

TEXT.P: Rubens Barrichello and Nico Hulkenberg will drive for Formula One team Williams next season.
Barrichello will be leaving constructors' champion Brawn GP to join Williams. Hulkenberg won the GP2 championship this season.
Williams team principal Frank Williams describes Barrichello as "not only the most experienced driver in Formula One, but a passionate and talented driver."
Barrichello and Hulkenberg are replacing Nico Rosberg and Kazuki Nakajima.
